attributes.action: Send foreign nurses home when their contracts end and employ more English nurses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the last NHS staff shortages thousands of foreign nurses were brought to Britain and given TEMPORARY contracts until the government could train more English nurses. Now there are thousands of unemployed English nurses and the foreign nurses whose contracts have run out are remaining here and continue to be employed by the NHS and the private sector.
